Package org.blab.river

Interface RiverProducer

public interface RiverProducer
Interface for publishing messages to River.

    Method

  • Field Details

    • PROPERTIES_BASE

      static final String PROPERTIES_BASE
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • send

      void send(Event event, Callback<Event> callback)
      Dispatch the event asynchronously and call the provided callback when the operation completes.
      Parameters:
      event - - event to dispatch
      callback - - user-provided callback that is called when the operation completes (sucessfully or not)
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the producer was closed before calling this method.
      RiverException - if there are unrecoverable errors (e.g. configuration or connection exceptions) occurs.

    • close

      void close()
      Close all connections with River. Waits for all pending tasks to complete.
